copyImageToDisk

public static void copyImageToDisk(String newFilePath,
                                   String existingFilePath)
Copy image to disk, in png format.

Parameters:
newFilePath - new file path. File type should be .png. Will be converted to system-independant path.
existingFilePath - existing image from api. (path is system-independant)

Parameters:
path - unix-style path to the file.
res - Ressource of the file
